name: Stickman Skater
description:
Ranked #2 paid apps USA, Ranked #1 Sports game in 15 countries. You are a little stickman skater just trying to make a name for himself by throwing down the biggest tricks at all the famous locations including Dogtown, Love Park, Carlsbad, Hollywood, Tampa and Wilshire. Do you have what it takes to turn pro and score that elusive skate mag cover photo?

FEATURES INCLUDE:

* Easy to pickup, hard to master!

* GameCenter leaderboards

* Ipod Playlist Integration

* Six different skaters to choose from

* Real physics with hundreds of parameters to ensure a fun yet familiar skateboarding experience

* 2 Control modes (Beginner and Advanced)

* Real skateboarding locations including Dogtown, Carlsbad, Hollywood and Wilshire, Love Park, Tampa

* Over 1000 different trick combinations possible.

* Level Select Mode

* 3 Achievements to obtain per level

* 2 Player Game of S.K.A.T.E

**************************************************
USER REVIEW: (TouchArcade user Seishu)
**************************************************

Absolutely Fantastic.

If you're a fan of skating games or sidescrolling games like canabalt, then you should check this game out. The two control methods are nice, the animation is fluid, and the gameplay is addictive. If you haven't seen the video, basically gameplay involves skating through various areas, pulling off tricks and picking up tokens for points. There is plenty of challenge in the game, so those 24 levels should keep you occupied for a while.

Definitely one not to pass up.
publishers: Turbo Chilli Pty Ltd trading as Traction Games
